      • getImageVectorOfBaseVector

        public java.util.Map<Vector,Scalar> getImageVectorOfBaseVector(Vector vec1)
        Method to get the image of the restriction of the homomorphism to the base of the source vector space. It gives a map e |- A(e) where A is the linear mapping and where e is a base element of the source vector space.
        Specified by:
        getImageVectorOfBaseVector in interface VectorSpaceHomomorphism
        Parameters:
        vec1 - the base vector.
        Returns:
        the image of the base vector.
